mot.description: Made from a combination of steamed rice flour and tapioca flour, topped with dried shrimps, crispy pork skin, scallion oil

hai.description: Clear, chewy tapioca dumplings filled with pork and shrimp

ba.description: Sizzling savory pancake stuffed with peeled shrimps, pork, bean sprouts

bon.description: Thin sheets of steamed rice batter filled with ground pork, jicama, wood ear mushrooms

nam.description: Crispy savory pancakes topped with coconut sauce, shrimp, minced pork

sau.description: Fried rice dough with egg and green onions

bay.description: Shredded rice paper mixed with tamarind sauce, fresh Vietnamese Coriander, chopped mango, quail eggs, beef jerky

tam.description: Grilled rice paper with quail eggs, sausage, green onions, dried shrimp

chin.description: Rolled rice paper quail eggs, beef jerky, pork floss, chopped mango

muoi.description: Three color bean dessert with a coconut milk soup base and taro pieces

muoiMot.description: A Vietnamese take on a classic Thai dessert tub tim krob with faux pomegranate seeds, mixed fruits, coconut milk

muoiHai.description: Sweet soup with mung bean and tapioca pearl

muoiBa.description: Creme caramel custard topped with coffee and ice

muoiNam.description: Made using medium to coarse ground dark roast Vietnamese coffee with a small metal drip filter

muoiSau.description: Vietnamese iced coffee with sweetened condensed milk

muoiBay.description: Freshly cooked soy milk served hot or cold

muoiChin.description: Made from whisked egg yolk, sweetened condensed milk, club soda
